Belgium: Birth of the future Charles V, Holy Roman Emperor, in Ghent.
Christening of the future Charles V, Holy Roman Emperor, in Ghent, with Margaret of York, Margaret of Austria, Charles, Prince of Chimay, and John, Lord of Bergen op Zoom as godparents.
Philip of Burgundy received as ruler in Béthune, Saint-Omer and Dunkirk.
Conference outside Calais between Henry VII of England and Philip of Burgundy.
